TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityMetadata extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 代表参数、子活动、变量和委托的集合，通过一个已配置的 引入执行环境。

span.span: Represents the set of arguments, child activities, variables, and delegates that a configured introduces to the execution environment.

span.span: Adds an argument to the collection of arguments of an activity.

span.span: The type of the extension provider.
The function that returns the extension.

summary.span: 将指定的扩展提供程序添加到活动的默认扩展提供程序的集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified extension provider to the collection of default extension providers for the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主机未提供 `T` 类型的扩展，则系统会对此扩展提供程序进行计算以提供一个此类型的扩展。If the host does not provide an extension of type `T`, then this extension provider is evaluated to provide one.

summary.span: 将指定的活动添加到导入的子活动的元数据列表中。

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata’s list of imported child activities.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddImportedChild(class System.Activities.Activity importedChild) cil managed

span.span: The activity to add.

summary.span: 将指定的活动添加到导入的子活动的元数据列表中。

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata’s list of imported child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导入的子活动是父活动不能直接安排的子活动。An imported child activity is a child activity that the parent activity does not schedule directly. 相反，之后父活动可以使用此活动配置一些其他子活动。Rather, then parent uses this activity to configure some other child activity.

The origin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导入的 是父活动未直接调用的 。An imported is an that the parent activity does not invoke directly. 相反，父活动会使用此 配置一些其他子活动。Rather, the parent uses this to configure some other child activity.

summary.span: 将一个验证错误添加到验证错误的元数据集合中。

span.span: Adds a validation error to the metadata’s collection of validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[Imperative Code-Based 验证](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/imperative-code-based-validation.md)。For more information, see [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/imperative-code-based-validation.md).

summary.span: 将指定的变量添加到变量的元数据集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata’s collection of variables.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddVariable(class System.Activities.Variable variable) cil managed

span.span: The variable to add.

summary.span: 将指定的变量添加到变量的元数据集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata’s collection of variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法添加的变量被视为活动的可公开配置图面的一部分，也就是说，它们将由活动的使用者提供。Variables added using this method are considered part of the activity’s publicly configurable surface, that is, they are to be provided by the consumer of the activity. 例如， 会使用此方法在它的 集合中添加变量。For example, adds the variables in its collection using this method. 活动的实现无法访问使用此方法添加的变量。An activity’s implementation cannot access variables added using this method. 通过 添加的活动（及它们的任何未实现子活动）可以访问使用此方法添加的变量。Activities added through (and any of their non-implementation child activities) can access variables added using this method. 例如， 会使用此方法添加它的 集合。For example, adds its collection in this manner.

The origin.

summary.span: 将指定的变量添加到变量的元数据集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata’s collection of variables.

span.span: Specifies that the activity requires an extension of the specified type at runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主机无法提供指定类型的扩展，验证将失败。If the host fails to provide an extension of the specified type, validation fails.
